body_html:
As mentioned before, ROIPool and ROIAlign are pretty much only used in Object Detection and hence it makes sense to put them in torchvision rather than create new layers in the main pytorch library. Since @fmassa already has an implementation ready, I don't see the need to reinvent the wheel at this point.

Also regarding the 0.4 release, @fmassa would it be possible to add the layers to torchvision now with the appropriate WIP warning? This way we can also catching bugs if any.
